bwwExcerpt: Directed by Kenny Leon (who nabbed a Tony in 2014 for his A Raisin in the Sun), Topdog/Underdog lays bare the push and pull of American aspirationalism. The play, about two Black brothers wrestling with their history of parental abandonment and desire for economic stability, is airy and oblique. Lin...
